title: Save £60 on this velvet sofa set!
content:
Given how much time we’ve all spent at home over the past year, we’ve probably become more aware of the importance of a nice comfy sofa that also looks the part. Whether you’re looking for a corner group or a sofa, Mylon’s range offers an unbeatable mix of style and value – plus, soft structured fabrics combined with deep filled fibre seats and backs make the sofas super comfortable too. The UK-manufactured Mylon Plush Velvet three-seater and two-seater sofa set comes available in four colours (blue, lime, olive and grey) to suit all styles of living room. And, with this exclusive deal, you can get £60 off (along with free delivery) this already affordable set, usually worth £599.99, by using the code DC10 when you purchase.
